raw_response:
{
  "debt_incurrence": "General incurrence permitted if, after Pro Forma effect, Senior Leverage Ratio ≤ 3.50x. Credit Facilities permitted up to $2,250.0mm plus the greater of (i) $700.0mm minus Notes issued on Issue Date and (ii) 75% of Consolidated EBITDA, plus additional amount so that First Lien Leverage Ratio ≤ 3.00x. Secured debt subject to Secured Leverage Ratio ≤ 6.00x in specified baskets. Non‑guarantor subsidiary debt capped at the greater of $50.0mm and 5% of Consolidated EBITDA. Acquisition/Investment debt permitted if Senior Leverage Ratio ≤ 3.50x (or no worse than prior) or First Lien Leverage Ratio no worse than prior. Permitted Refinancings allowed subject to maturity/WAL tests. Classification and reclassification permitted. fileciteturn0file19turn0file9turn0file11turn0file3",
  "restricted_payments": "General RP test requires no Event of Default and satisfaction of builder/available capacity tests. Builder basket includes retained excess cash flow mechanics; specific RP baskets include: (i) dividends/redemptions up to greater of $150.0mm and 15% of Consolidated EBITDA; (ii) equity exchange/redemptions with new equity; (iii) employee equity/withholding payments; (iv) annual dividends equal to 6.0% of net cash proceeds from IPO‑related equity offerings through but excluding Issue Date; (v) additional RPs if, Pro Forma, Total Leverage Ratio ≤ 4.50x and no EoD. Junior Financing prepayments prior to maturity permitted if Total Leverage Ratio ≤ 5.00x and no EoD. Reclassification among baskets permitted. fileciteturn0file2turn0file6turn0file13turn0file18",
  "asset_sales": "Asset Sales require Fair Market Value and, for sales over the greater of $50.0mm and 5% of Consolidated EBITDA, at least 75% cash consideration. Net Proceeds must be applied within 450 days to repay Notes, Senior Credit Facilities, other First Lien or Senior Indebtedness. Excess Proceeds trigger an Asset Sale Offer to repurchase Notes (and pari passu/first lien debt) per Section 3.08 mechanics; remaining proceeds after an offer may be used freely and Excess Proceeds reset to zero. Temporary application to revolvers permitted; foreign law repatriation exceptions apply. fileciteturn0file14turn0file10",
  "change_of_control": "Upon a Change of Control, Company must offer to purchase all Notes at 101% of principal plus accrued interest, unless previously redeemed. Offer must be commenced within 60 days following the Change of Control; tender mechanics per indenture with a specified Change of Control Payment Date. ",
  "liens_and_other": "Liens covenant requires equal‑and‑ratable (or senior to junior financing) security if an Initial Lien is granted on non‑Collateral; lien released when underlying lien released. Transactions with Affiliates limited to arm’s‑length terms. Negative pledge applies per Section 4.09. Future Guarantors: any Restricted Subsidiary guaranteeing Senior Credit Facilities, Existing Notes, or capital markets debt >$250.0mm must become a guarantor within 60 days and grant first‑lien security, subject to fraudulent conveyance limits. fileciteturn0file4turn0file12",
  "reasoning_steps": [
    "Step 1: Located Article IV covenants and specific sections (4.05, 4.06, 4.07–4.10, 4.11, 4.16) within input.pdf.",
    "Step 2: Extracted explicit ratio tests, dollar baskets, percentages, and timing requirements directly from the cited sections and summarized only those quantitative mechanics."
  ]
}

Secured debt subject to Secured Leverage Ratio ≤ 6.00x in specified baskets. Non‑guarantor subsidiary debt capped at the greater of $50.0mm and 5% of Consolidated EBITDA.
